comments.text:
Example:

https://bug618353.bugzilla.mozilla.org/attachment.cgi?id=512161

STR:

1) open fx
2) size the window in horizontally until the home button intersects the outer nav bar border. 

See screen shot. We need some sort of "absolute padding" here.
